(as of Nov 30,2022 04:44:23 UTC – Details)


More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Rear Camera: 48MP, F2.0 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 + 2MP, F2.4, Front Camera: 8MP, F2.2, Bluetooth 5.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41 – Dual SIM
International Model – No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost

4
Price: $249.99 - $174.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:44:23 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:08 UTC – Details)


Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

Previous page

From the brand

More Door Levers in Store

More Styles Available in Store

More Styles in Store

More Home Hardware Available

More Wheels in Store

Item model number ‏ : ‎ Black
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 14, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TICONN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09G62S6ZZ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

[Universal & Premium] Designed for universal compatibility – offers a direct replacement solution for almost any rolling chair with standard stem. Made with quality and premium components – heavy-duty powder-coated carbon steel bracket, precision shielded ball bearings, wear resistant polyurethane casters. Please note that our design incorporated universal grip ring stem (7/16″ x 7/8″ or 11mm x22mm) which unfortunately does NOT fit IKEA chairs.
[Quiet & Smooth] Designed to every detail, and built with tight tolerances. Aiming to achieve boundary and gap free rolling experience – achieves smooth, quiet, and non-scratch gliding experience on all flooring types without chair mat ever. The 3″ elastic polyurethane casters offers a greater surface contact, achieving enhanced comfortless and quietness without any sacrifice in maneuverability and durability. Our caster system supports up to 650 lbs.
[Everywhere & Whenever] With the added rubbery touch, feel free to rock on any surfaces even during the quietest moment. Eliminates Desk Floor Mat, great for office sharing space, professional gaming environment, or even around your sleeping babies at home office. These rollerblade wheels are great alternatives for office chair wheels replacement parts while upgrading office accessories and home office supplies.
[Invest & Protect] Extend your daily reach with minimal investment and efforts, protects all that surrounds you, not just the hardwood flooring but also who you care about. Simply revamp that squeaky, noisy poor chair with our system, obtaining total silence cruising around freely.
[TICONN BRAND QUALITY COMMITMENT] – We stand behind the quality of our products. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us. We provide 30-day money back and 12-month warranty. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee for risk-free shopping!

IKEA Chairs Incompatible!

Universal Size Stem

Non-Marking with All Floorings

Smooth and Quiet

Price: $159.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:21:24 UTC – Details)


Network
NO 5G AND NFC
Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. networks. TCL 30 SE android phone is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

Note
* TCL 30 SE is single SIM mobile phone, does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.
* Wifi calling supported on these carriers: T-mobile, Metro, Straight talk/tracfone t-mobile sim card, simple, walmart family mobile, ultra mobile, mint mobile.

Information
Turn your great times into magical memories with a 50MP AI triple camera. Enjoy collecting memories with large storage of up to 128GB. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, while a minimalistic design makes you live in style. The face key & fingerprint sensor provide access effortlessly.

Technical Parameters:
2G Quadbands : GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands : B1/2/4/5/8
4G LTE bands: B2/3/4/5/7/8/12/13/17/26/28/66
Display: 6.52-inch Mini-notch HD+ 20:9 display (720 x 1600 pixels)
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 8MP
Chipset: Helio G25
CPU: 4 x Cortex-A53 @ 2.0GHz+4 x Cortex-A53 @ 1.5GHz
GPU: IMG GE8320 650MHz
Memory: 4GB RAM + 128GB ROM (Supports micro SD card up to 512GB, SD card not included)
Dimensions:.6.50 x 2.97 x 0.35 inch
Battery: 5000mAh
Audio：One speaker + dual-mic noise cancellation

What’s in the box
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile phone
1 x TCL 30 SE Mobile Phone Case
1 x Screen Protector
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Charger (5V 2A)
1 x Sim Card Pin 
1 x Quick Guide
Notes: Headphones, SIM Card and SD Card are not included.
6.52″ HD+ display: Powered by NXTVISION, AI optimization allows the screen to deliver more colorfulness and crisp clarity to immerse you in subtle details. Eye-comfort modes have better protection against blue light. You will feel less eye strain while using TCL mobile phone 30 SE in dimly lit places and enjoy reading time comfortably under sunlight. 
Wireless carrier: Compatible with the T-Mobile and AT&T LTE networks. This device is currently not certified for use on Verizon. Not compatible with any CDMA networks. (such as Verizon, Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
50MP AI triple camera & Gesture shooting: With TCL 30 SE android phone, you can capture fast-moving subjects or take clear photos in dimly lit environments. Gesture shooting entirely frees your hands and makes taking easier.
Two-day battery life: 5000 mAh massive battery lets you worry less about battery levels during weekends. Two-day battery life keeps you doing what you love, and intelligent charging mode prolongs the battery’s lifespan.
TCL 30 SE mobile phone does not support 5G, NFC, and 5Ghz Wi-Fi.This Model is the US version with a one-year US warranty, single SIM.
About screen sensitivity: Our phones are set to a neutral screen sensitivity defaultly. If you find the screen unsensitive, please adjust the sensitivity level through settings ( Settings -> System – > Languages & input ->Advanced ->Pointer speed).Drag the slider right to increase sensitivity. Drag the slider left to decrease sensitivity.


Previous page

  1. PREMIUM DISPLAY, INTUITIVE FEATURES

    Enjoy the expansive 6.52” display, powered by NXTVISION. Watch as your videos and photos come to life with vibrant true-to-life color enhancements and real-time HDR upscaling.

  2. BINGE WITHOUT WORRY

    Adaptive Eye care modes reduce harmful blue lights, turn monochromatic for a booklike feel, and promotes readability in direct sunlight.

Next page

Previous page

  1. INTELLIGENTLY BEAUTIFUL

    Capturing stunning photos and HD video has never been so easy with AI-powered 50MP triple rear camera system with 2MP Depth and Macro lens.

  2. COMPLETE ANY CHALLENGE

    Use the built-in features to make taking the perfect photo even easier, with Gesture Shot a simple movement can activate the countdown timer and Steady Snap to capture motion with less blur.

  3. BEAUTIFULLY YOU

    Show your best side in video chats using the 8MP front-facing camera, while HDR elevates all your stunning selfies.

Next page

Previous page

  1. MAXIMUM RELIABILITY

    Take on your day or new adventures with a powerful 5000mAh battery delivers a days worth of mixed-use on a single charge letting you focus on the task at hand and not searching for the next outlet.

  2. MORE FOR YOU TO ENJOY

    Feel the sublime user experience powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core processor and multitask to your hearts delight with 4GB of RAM for always smooth performance.

  3. ENOUGH SPACE FOR IT ALL

    Store all of your favorite content with 128GB of internal storage, expandable to 512GB via microSD card (sold separately).

Next page

ARTFULLY CRAFTED, DIGITALLY SECURE

Simple and sleek with a finish that glistens in the light. Biometric security safely stores your data and content so only you can access it.

4

Product Description

Adjustable Straps

Adjustable safety straps that will tie the cover securely to the headrest. There is also a non-slip pad back of the backrest, the car seat protector for back seat won’t move once installed

Highly Resilient Car Seat Protector

Car seat seat protector protect leather and cloth fabric car seats from spills, scuffs, indentations, and scratches. After the cushion is installed, make sure it does not affect the seat belt position

Non-slip, Not Easy to Fade

The back of the whole car seat protector is used with white non-slip points, which are denser than ordinary black non-slip materials, more non-slip, and Will not stain your light-colored leather seats

Large Carseat Protectors for Vehicles

WATER-RESISTANT 600D FABRIC MATERIALLEATHER REINFORCED CORNERSETS SCRATCHES PROTECTIONPETS SCRATCHES PROTECTION

Car Seat Protector for Child Car Seat

Seat Protector Under Baby Car Seat

Highly resilient fabric, thicken padded protects the seat from creasing and cracking caused by the baby car seat or booster seat

Car Seat Covers for Infant Car Seat

for graco car seat replacement parts and more child car seat

2 Mesh PocketsLarge-capacity storage children’s toys, water cups, picture albums, etc. Keep the car tidy

Back Seat Protector- Protect leather fabric seats from spills, scuffs, indentations, and scratches. Use high-quality Oxford, non-toxic, harmless and breathable. NO bad chemical smell, overwhelming smell or pungent smell. Will not leave any marks or goo residue on any colour seats
Car Seat Protector for Child Car Seat- Baby car seat protector extend your car upholstery life, highly resilient fabric protects the seat from creasing and cracking caused by the baby booster car seat. The 2 large pockets in the bottom for storing your child’s toys, and treats, books
Durable& Easy to Clean- Back seat cover for kids, wear-resistant and durable, water-resistant. Footprints and stains can be wiped off with a damp cloth easily. Made of thickened 600D fabric, leather reinforced corners, can be used as a seat cover for dog cat seat
Non Slip& No Marks- We selected the densest WHITE non-slip points to apply to the entire backrest and seat mat of car seat cover, which is more non-slip than ordinary seat protector. It’s heat resistant, Won’t melt and Won’t leave any marks on the light leather seats. Top quality adjustment buckle and straps, adjustable length and tight, fasten to the headrest to ensure car seat pad do not slip off
Large Car Seat Mat- The backrest: 23.6 x19 inch, the seat: 18.5 x 19 inch, the mesh is 15 x 8.5 inch. Perfectly cover the seat and backrest, fit to most vehicles with the measurement. Breathable mesh on the back provides comfort for your family travel. Easy to install and remove. Our car seat back protectorprotect every detail

Warranty & Support

Price: $169.00 - $99.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:00:55 UTC – Details)


Control Your Comfort and Your Color Scheme, or use your tablet or computer. All you need is a Wi-Fi connection, or use the free app for smartphone/tablet to manage thermostat remotely and take advantage of savings when away and maintain comfort when home. Simple setup takes the hassle out of programming your thermostat. You can also control thermostat using the touch screen and change the background color to match your paint color or personal preference. Your RTH9585WF features flexible seven day programming, energy savings mode, an indoor humidity sensor, and voice command through the Total Connect Comfort app.
COMFORT COMES IN YOUR COLOR. Personalize your Wi-Fi Smart Color Programmable Thermostat to fit your décor.
SAVE ENERGY AND GET REWARDED by checking with your energy provider about available energy savings rebates to save on your purchase (use rebate finder link above). Plus, eligible customers can enroll in ongoing energy savings incentives with their energy provider to keep saving all year long.
YOUR SCHEDULE. YOUR WAY. Flexible programming options for your schedule or utility company’s peak rate pricing.
EASY OPERATION AND INTUITIVE. Bright, easy-to-read touchscreen makes for simple operation.
COMPATIBLE WITH: Forced air (gas, oil or electric), hot water and steam, and heat pumps with electric backup. Does NOT work with electric baseboard heat (120-240V). C-Wire required.
ENERGY STAR certified. Help save energy, track your heating and cooling with monthly energy reports and get personalized tips on reducing energy use.
Before purchasing, check to see if this thermostat is compatible with your home and to determine if your home needs a C-wire power adapter.
Works with most heat/cool oil furnace systems. Will not work with heating only oil furnace systems unless a C-Wire is present.

Customizable

A thermostat for your decor

The full-color display can be customized to fit your unique style, with color selection to match your home’s décor. Enjoy versatility and performance with this smart home thermostat.

This Wi-Fi Thermostat also allows you to create a custom temperature schedule for every day of the week. When schedules change, you can temporarily update the settings with ease. Plus, with it’s smart response technology, it learns your preferences, helping it achieve your preferred temperature when you need it.

App compatibility

You’re in control from anywhere

Choose from the Total Connect Comfort app or the Resideo app to control your Wi-Fi thermostat anytime, anywhere. You will also receive intelligent alerts, such as air filter and humidifier pad change reminders.

Easily connect your Wi-Fi Smart Color Thermostat with compatible voice assistant devices like Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Microsoft Cortana, and more.
